Articles.Content:
I don't see this on the WNTS list so I believe it's ok.

It would be great if it was possible to see a preview of the craft I selected in the tracking station. My idea is that if I select a ship in the list, a window would open at the lower right corner of the map view after a short time (while the game loads the ship's model; I expect it wouldn't take longer than the skip when I get a ship within radius when I'm doing rendezvous). Just the model would be ok, nearby planets are not necessary.

The reason is, sometimes when I go delete debris I am not sure what I'm deleting. And to check it out, I need to switch to it and then go back to tracking station which takes considerable time and after return I'm not sure which item in the list I selected anymore. I have already deleted a perfectly fine mission once thanks to that and the fact that the game marks my debris as ships or landers way too often.
